Loved all three of these movies, with the second our favorite. The fun is harmless and probably best appreciated by those who have already passed the purgatory of jr. high...although those in the middle of it might have some sympathy. The parents are caring and intelligent, which we like.
Some of the high points for us were:
The "cheese touch"
Rodrick's history paper
The name of Rodrick's band...misspelled...and awful
Rodrick's brotherly advice
Greg, in his tidy whities, locked out of his grandfather's apt in the golden age center
The bathroom door substitution...parents will never notice...not
Greg's outfit he wears helping Rowley last minute at the talent show
Rodrick's reaction to the Cats song sung by the mean girl
So many more. As I said, the second was our favorite. The actor who portrayed Rodrick had perfect timing and nailed it. We enjoyed him.
We will show these movies to our grandchildren. There were some great values taught in a fun way.
I highly recommend

My 8 year old loves these movies and books.  Great deal for three movies!

This is a hilarious series ! My older boys are in elementary school,  and they enjoy reading and watching the "Diary of a Wimpy Kid" series. My husband and I laughed out loud. It is nice to be able to watch something without worrying about cuss words or sexual hints. Three movies for $20, you can't beat it!

Two grandkids love these books so I ordered the movies.  My grandbabies, my mother and I watched all three movies together.  All of us enjoyed the movies, but I think my mother and I loved them the most.  Both of us were rolling with laughter.  Some of the scenes were hilarious!

The themes were well developed.  The resolutions were satisfying.

In my opinion, anything that can entertain kids under 10, an 80 year old, and a 60 year old, is a pretty good item.
great movie my family loves it.

Hilarious, laugh out loud, awesome clean family fun! I recommend these shows to all my friends. Please understand and follow the age recommendations for your own kids as there is some big brother picking on little brother scenarios, neighborhood bullies,typical junior high antics that I don't watch with my 6 y/o (although cleaner than TV (and it's lame commercials)). Awesome writers, great acting, refreshing great clean fun. Thank you Diary series, great deal to get all three, great price
